messages.subject: Mid-West To-ken Taikai and Shinsa

messages.messageBody:
http://www.midwesttokenkai.com/show/Welcome.html

Just a reminder that this event is fast approaching, all who are in
the Chicago area and anyone expected to be in town that weekend are
welcome. Always worth the drive...
-t
